metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34305 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: In Apache Tomcat 10.1.0-M1 to 10.1.0-M16, 10.0.0-M1 to 10.0.22, 9.0.30 to 9.0.64 and 8.5.50 to 8.5.81 the Form authentication example in the examples web application displayed user provided data without filtering, exposing a XSS vulnerability.

criterions.comment: tomcat6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
tomcat7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
tomcat8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
